description: Osmosi is part of the Fattoria Svetoni, a hotel with beautiful guestrooms housed in a historic villa overlooking vineyards in open countryside, and which also boasts a winery dating back to 1865. ...
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Garden or park, Interesting wine list, Terrace
